text: Update: this place is really a hit or miss . Ordered a junior pizza and it looks like they just threw the toppings on with a bunch of cheese. Pieces super uneven. I mean if you donâ€™t care about where you work or what you are doing while at â€¦More

text: Ordered pizza tonight had a 40 min delivery time 30 minutes after that still no food or phone call stating there was a issue had to call and cancel order not even an apology when I called about issue

text: Was just there ask the manager why did it take so long to make a sub and the first thing out her mouth was if I ask har again she was gone call the police when I walked in there 15 minutes before they closed and was told my food would be â€¦More

name: Missy Y Bostick
text: I love how fresh the food is here and the workers make sure to always wash there hands before handling food. The store is clean and I always get the 3 cheese bread lol but I love the pizza too! it is always good. This is my favorite pizza spot.

name: don johnson
text: Drivers rude. Guy on the phone was a burnout. Cried and told us we waisted his time because he couldn't find our house... It's a hungry howie's as far as food goes so you don't miss much.

name: Alyssa Minton
text: Great customer service! I needed my order picked up at a certain time on valentines and Tony was able to make it happen. Thank you so much!

name: NaTruAls Products
text: My friend goes here quite often and loves their chicken pizzas and garlic crust. He boast about the taste and freshness of their pizzas. They know him there and He simply loves it because of the customer service he receives.

name: Sara Pastora
text: To have them give me half cheese and half just sauce and mushroom and no cheese? ðŸ˜² never will order here again, come on! Every one topping pizza includes cheese! Why would I order just sauce and mushroom with no cheese? That's not even a â€¦More

name: Cynthia
text: Not worth what I spent, I should have walked out the door and over to Hollywood Mkt and purchased a whole steak dinner and just cooked for myself Period!! Customer service was good tho, worth 2 stars. That's why I stayed, but look what I got. ðŸ˜ž

text: They are close to me and I love the delivery service it's always on time

text: Ordered a $7.99 call in order about 3 days ago for a a large two topping pizza that says carry out only. I called today and the girl says that is only when I Order online.... That is cost me $11some change. It doesnâ€™t say online only on the deals.

text:
I'm a long time customer and they refused to let me place an order through Grubhub. My driver went to pick up my order and they refused him. They told him I would have to call the store myself and use only their drivers for the delivery.
I am officially DONE with hungry howies.

text: I don't usually go there for my pizza, but tried it as it is very close. I was very happy with it. Very good.

text: I ordered pizza, cheese bread and wings, I'm not a pizza person, so the wings were for me. I tried a wing and it had a sour taste, so i tried another it was the same, i had my son try one, who by the way eats everything, and he too said â€¦More

text: Store Is Completely Terrible Last Time They Took 42$ from me and said The Online Order Didn't Process & I Give them another try and placed a online order and at 9:41pm & 11:14pm. I have to call the store to find out that my order was taken â€¦More

text: Hi thought id try HH first time in a long time. I made pizzas ect, about 15 - 20 yrs. ago. They left off a 2 litre from my order and the double cheese was about 1.2 cheese. the driver was extremely  non -verbal and  a bit menacing didnt â€¦More

text: They cannot get our order right, if you are someone that likes to split toppings on a pizza, chances are they will screw it up. It has happened to us 4 times in a row even after telling the concern to the order taker. Unfortunately  we wonâ€™t be coming back, love the pizza just want it how we order it.

text: This was presumably thee finest pizza pie I have ever digisted. I was in awe by the scrumptious costumer service. I wish I could have stuffed ten pies down my gullet. God Bless Howie himself.

text: I ordered 2 subs, items were missing on one of them so i called. The manager was disgusting and rude. Instead of coming to a resolution after openly admitting she forgot to put the items on the sub, she proceeds to hang up the phone on me. â€¦More

text: The pizza from here is always DELISH,  but whoever made my thin veggie with 10 extra instruction tonight (lol) took it to the next level! So good! Driver was lovely as well. We order from here regularly, never disappointed. ðŸ™Œ

text: I ordered a Lrg Pizza & hot wings at 2:55pm I waited until 4:05 & called to inquire why my ordered hadn't been recieve. I was told it had just left & would take another 20-25 minutes to get to me. I then requested to speak with a manager â€¦More

name: Tiffany Austin
text: Found a very long strand of Hair cooked into the cheese on my pizza as I bit into it!! (My pizza was replaced but I wasn't refunded or compensated in any way.)  Prior orders were incorrect on several occasions, and the customer service is â€¦More

text: This is from earlier today. I ordered a Howie Roll, a delicious calzone. I wanted extra pepperoni inside it, and when I tried to eat it my AC blew all the parmesan into my eyes, I had to go to urgent care. I ate the roll afterwards and it was great, 5/5
